messages.subject: Re: trip to Argentina for teen unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: what an awesome trip this will be. We lived abroad in Buenos Aires for a year and we had our daughter there. I have a blog still Moving to Argentina...
messages.messageBody:
what an awesome trip this will be. We lived abroad in Buenos Aires for
a year and we had our daughter there. I have a blog still Moving to
Argentina... http://movingtoargentina.typepad.com

Laura

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
>
> This just arrived and I'm passing it on:
> ==========================================
>
> Hi Sandra or Always Learning list owner,
>
> My name is Blake and I'm organizing a trip to Argentina this fall for
> teenage unschoolers. The 6-week journey will guided by two
> experienced leaders (myself and Abbi Miller, both advisers at Not
> Back to School Camp), and its purpose is to create independent
> travelers. Abbi and I are investing lots of time and money into
> successfully making this the first international expedition tailored
> for teen unschoolers.
>
> We're currently seeking to get the word out to online unschooling
> groups. ...
> Sincerely,
>
> Blake Boles
> Director - Unschool Adventures, LLC
>
>
>
> Here's the website:
>
> http://www.blakeboles.com/arg2008/
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] trip to Argentina for teen unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: The Millers are part of our local group  !  Abby has a younger sister - our son s age (13). Lisa W. The 6-week journey will guided by two experienced leaders
messages.messageBody:
The Millers are part of our "local group" ! Abby has a younger sister - our son's age (13).

Lisa W.




The 6-week journey will guided by two
experienced leaders (myself and Abbi Miller, both advisers at Not
Back to School Camp),
.

messages.subject: trip to Argentina for teen unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: This just arrived and I m passing it on: ========================================== Hi Sandra or Always Learning list owner, My name is Blake and I m
messages.messageBody:
This just arrived and I'm passing it on:
==========================================

Hi Sandra or Always Learning list owner,

My name is Blake and I'm organizing a trip to Argentina this fall for
teenage unschoolers. The 6-week journey will guided by two
experienced leaders (myself and Abbi Miller, both advisers at Not
Back to School Camp), and its purpose is to create independent
travelers. Abbi and I are investing lots of time and money into
successfully making this the first international expedition tailored
for teen unschoolers.

We're currently seeking to get the word out to online unschooling
groups. ...
Sincerely,

Blake Boles
Director - Unschool Adventures, LLC



Here's the website:

http://www.blakeboles.com/arg2008/

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
